amendment.description: To require a Bureau of Indian Affairs report analyzing the facilities investments required to improve direct service and tribally operated detention and public safety facilities in Indian country.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1025 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1025 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sinema to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6313) To require a Bureau of Indian Affairs report analyzing the facilities investments required to improve direct service and tribally operated detention and public safety facilities in Indian country.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1025 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1025 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Sinema to Amendment SA 948.
